description.value: +5 Willpower, +3 Fellowship, -5 Perception. Gain Common Lore (Imperial Navy), Speak Language (Battlefleet War Cant) and either Navigation (Stellar) or Pilot(Space Craft) as Trained skills. Gain +5 to all Command Tests. Zero/Low Gravity Environments are not Difficult Terrain, and don't get space travel sickness. Suffer -2 to Initiative and Double penalty for firing weapons at Long Range or Greater unless inside confined space.

choices.label: Choose from: Navigation (Stellar), Pilot(Space Craft) as Trained skills

system.effectText: +5 Willpower, +3 Fellowship, -5 Perception. Gain Common Lore (Imperial Navy),  Speak Language (Battlefleet War Cant) and either Navigation (Stellar) or Pilot(Space Craft) as Trained skills. Gain +5 to all Command Tests. Zero/Low Gravity Environments are not Difficult Terrain, and don't get space travel sickness. Suffer -2 to Initiative and Double penalty for firing weapons at Long Range or Greater unless inside confined space.
